means: 因骑马而引起的肌肉酸痛和僵硬的（人）

sentence.Network_en: If your skin becomes red, sore or very scaly, consult your doctor.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果皮肤发红、瘙痒或脱皮，要向医生咨询。

sentence.Network_en: Naomi was given a pony and taught to ride side-saddle.
sentence.Network_cn: 别人给娜奥米一匹小型马并教会她如何侧骑马。

sentence.Network_en: He ran to the door and vaulted into the saddle.
sentence.Network_cn: 他跑到门口，飞身跃上马背。
